channel.title: Docket EPA-HQ-OPPT-2020-0493 Comments
channel.description: Public comments on regulations.gov docket EPA-HQ-OPPT-2020-0493: Fees for the Administration of the Toxic Substances Control Act

item.title: 15 New Comments on Docket EPA-HQ-OPPT-2020-0493 on 2023-01-19
item.description:
On 2023-01-19, 15 new public comments were posted for docket EPA-HQ-OPPT-2020-0493 (Fees for the Administration of the Toxic Substances Control Act).

15 New Comments

  1. Comment submitted by American Fuel & Petrochemical Manufacturers (AFPM)
  2. Comment submitted by Society of Chemical Manufacturers & Affiliates (SOCMA)
  3. Comment submitted by Environmental Defense Fund (EDF)
  4. Comment submitted by Novozymes
  5. Comment submitted by Enzyme Technical Association (ETA)
  6. Comment submitted by Silicones Environmental, Health, and Safety Center (SEHSC)
  7. Comment submitted by Downstream Users Coalition
  8. Comment submitted by Alliance for Automotive Innovation
  9. Comment submitted by Alkylphenols & Ethoxylates Research Council (APERC)
  10. Comment submitted by Independent Lubricant Manufacturers Association (ILMA)
  11. Comment submitted by AFL-CIO et al.
  12. Comment submitted by American Chemistry Council (ACC)
  13. Comment submitted by Safer Chemicals Healthy Families, Natural Resources Defense Council, and Earthjustice
  14. Comment submitted by The Vinyl Institute (VI)
  15. Comment submitted by North American Insulation Manufacturers Association (NAIMA)

item.title: 11 New Comments on Docket EPA-HQ-OPPT-2020-0493 on 2023-01-18
item.description:
On 2023-01-18, 11 new public comments were posted for docket EPA-HQ-OPPT-2020-0493 (Fees for the Administration of the Toxic Substances Control Act).

11 New Comments

  1. Comment submitted by Coalition for Chemical Innovations (CCI)
  2. Comment submitted by Dibutyl Phthalate Consortium et al.
  3. Comment submitted by Fragrance Creators Association
  4. Comment submitted by American Coatings Association (ACA)
  5. Comment submitted by Plastics Industry Association (PLASTICS)
  6. Comment submitted by Household & Commercial Products Association (HCPA)
  7. Comment submitted by American Petroleum Institute (API)
  8. Comment submitted by The Fertilizer Institute (TFI)
  9. Comment submitted by Utility Solid Waste Activities Group (USWAG)
  10. Comment submitted by Fragrance Science & Advocacy Council (FSAC)
  11. Comment submitted by National Association of Chemical Distributors (NACD)
